claim: Orcish Artillery has the earliest ruling date among Orcish Artillery, Aura of Silence, and Guerrilla Tactics, not the latest.
reasoning: All three cards (Orcish Artillery, Aura of Silence, and Guerrilla Tactics) share the same ruling date of 2004-10-04. Therefore, Orcish Artillery does not have a uniquely earliest ruling date, and it equally shares the latest ruling date. The claim that it has the earliest but not the latest is contradicted by the data showing all dates are identical.

(

        primary key autoincrement,
    artist                  TEXT,

    availability            TEXT,
    borderColor             TEXT,
    cardKingdomFoilId       TEXT,
    cardKingdomId           TEXT,
    colorIdentity           TEXT,

    faceConvertedManaCost   REAL,
    faceName                TEXT,
    flavorName              TEXT,
    flavorText              TEXT,
    frameEffects            TEXT,
    frameVersion            TEXT,
    hand                    TEXT,
    hasAlternativeDeckLimit INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasContentWarning       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasFoil                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasNonFoil              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isAlternative           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isFullArt               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly            INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOversized             INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPromo                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReprint               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReserved              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStarter               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStorySpotlight        INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTextless              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTimeshifted           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keywords                TEXT,
    layout                  TEXT,

    loyalty                 TEXT,
    manaCost                TEXT,
    mcmId                   TEXT,
    mcmMetaId               TEXT,

    side                    TEXT,

);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "foreign_data"
(
    id           INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    flavorText   TEXT,
    language     TEXT,
    multiverseid INTEGER,
    name         TEXT,
    text         TEXT,
    type         TEXT,
    uuid         TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    uuid   TEXT

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "rulings"
(
    id   INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    date DATE,
    text TEXT,
    uuid TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.text: Good, there's a `rulings` table with a `date` column. Now let me query the ruling dates for the three cards mentioned.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT c.name, r.date FROM cards c JOIN rulings r ON c.uuid = r.uuid WHERE c.name IN ('Orcish Artillery', 'Aura of Silence', 'Guerrilla Tactics') ORDER BY c.name, r.date;"
input.description: Get ruling dates for the three cards

content.text: Let me also check if there are distinct ruling dates per card:

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT c.name, MIN(r.date) as earliest_date, MAX(r.date) as latest_date FROM cards c JOIN rulings r ON c.uuid = r.uuid WHERE c.name IN ('Orcish Artillery', 'Aura of Silence', 'Guerrilla Tactics') GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY earliest_date;"
input.description: Get earliest and latest ruling dates per card

content.content:
Aura of Silence|2004-10-04|2004-10-04
Guerrilla Tactics|2004-10-04|2004-10-04
Orcish Artillery|2004-10-04|2004-10-04

tool_use_result.stdout:
Aura of Silence|2004-10-04|2004-10-04
Guerrilla Tactics|2004-10-04|2004-10-04
Orcish Artillery|2004-10-04|2004-10-04

content.text:
All three cards have the same ruling date: `2004-10-04`. They all share the same earliest (and only) ruling date. The claim states that "Orcish Artillery has the earliest ruling date among" the three cards, and also says it does "not" have "the latest." 

Since all three cards have the exact same ruling date, Orcish Artillery doesn't have a uniquely "earliest" date — it's tied with the other two. The claim asserts Orcish Artillery has the earliest but not the latest, which implies it's distinct from the others. Since all dates are identical, Orcish Artillery has the same date as the others — it is neither uniquely earliest nor uniquely latest. The claim that it has "the earliest" is misleading/incorrect since it's tied, and the assertion that it does "not" have "the latest" is also contradicted since it has the same date as all others (meaning it also has the latest date, being tied).

```json
{"label": "CONTRADICTED", "reasoning": "All three cards (Orcish Artillery, Aura of Silence, and Guerrilla Tactics) share the same ruling date of 2004-10-04. Therefore, Orcish Artillery does not have a uniquely earliest ruling date, and it equally shares the latest ruling date. The claim that it has the earliest but not the latest is contradicted by the data showing all dates are identical."}
```
